## mole domains reload

Reload caddy config

### Synopsis

Reload validates the caddy config
	and realoads the caddy sevice if everything is correct.

```
mole domains reload [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for reload
```

* [mole domains](mole_domains.md)	 - Interact with caddy reverse proxy
